data.title: Goober and the Ghost Chasers
data.meta_description: Get spooked with ghost hunters Gilly, Ted and Tina as they travel the globe with their reluctant pooch Goober on a search for paranormal action in thiâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

Assignment: The Ahab Apparition

The Partridge Family Kids are vacationing at Peaceful Cove, but it is anything but peaceful.

21 min Â· Sep 8, 1973

EPISODE 2

Brush up Your Shakespeare

The Partridge Kids are suppose to play a concert, but their performance is canceled when Macbeth's ghost begins haunting the hall.

21 min Â· Sep 15, 1973 TV-G

EPISODE 3

The Galloping Ghost

Star basketball player, Wilt Chamberlain, buys a dude ranch that is haunted by a dude ghost.

21 min Â· Sep 22, 1973 TV-G

EPISODE 4

The Singing Ghost

Frankenstein's Monster the Third tricks the Partridge Kids into coming to his castle to discuss a singing engagement.

21 min Â· Sep 29, 1973 TV-G

EPISODE 5

The Ghost Ship

The Partridge Family Kids and Goober and the gang are on board the Sea Witch, a haunted pirate ship, to take some publicity photos.

21 min Â· Oct 6, 1973 TV-G
